comments.body:
See https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AIRFLOW-4865. We already have a tests/test_utils/decorators.py that contains a mock_conf_get decorator that we should use everywhere we need to change a config value in a test. 

Could you also re-target against that Jira?

Thanks, I updated the ticket in the commit message. It looks like the `mock_conf_get` decorator / context manager isn't used anywhere, and handles fewer cases than the decorator I added, so I'm proposing to delete it and just use the new code. I also simplified the proposed new decorator--I didn't know that `contextlib.contextmanager` produces a function that's both a decorator and a context manager.
That was used in one or two places, I guess that got removed, but this new one is nicer!
